Articles.Content: Is it possible to get to outerspace or land on the moon in demo mode? If so please give me some tips on how to build a rocket in ordr to do so because it seems impossible and I feel like I have tried everything. Thanks!!

Welcome to the forums!

Yup, both is possible. There are tons of tutorials about building spacecrafts and reaching the Mun in the 'How to' thread. You should also chek out the 'Addon Releases and Projects Showcase' thread for mods, which can make reaching your goals easier.
